title: Demotion?
body: Hi there, I'm gold 5 a zero LP and recently have been avoiding playing ranked because I'm afraid I'll be demoted. I got up to 80 some odd LP and was very close to getting into my series for gold 4, but then ranked took a turn and I plummeted on a losing streak. I'm back to zero LP, but even then I played, in hopes I could gain something, unfortunately I lost them all. I'm incredibly concerned that I will get demoted if I lose another, which gives me a lot of anxiety when I debate about playing ranked again. I'd like to win another, so I can have a cushion to play more, but I really don't want to be back in silver. Does anyone know how to tell if you'll be demoted if you lose another? I've tried looking at the ranked board in my profile, but I don't really understand it. It has a little 3 with an arrow pointing down next to my name, does that mean three more loses until I'm demoted? Any help is appreciated

replies.body: Losing at 0 LP will make you demote. If you have 0 LP and you know you don't want to risk demoting, I'd suggest to not play ranked anymore.
{{sticker:sg-soraka}} so I gamble with my chances? alright :(

In the leaderboard for your ranking, the arrows just show if you went up or down in the standings. 

For your problem, you can't truly tell if you are going to get demoted after your next game. If you are afraid of demotion, don't rank. If you want to keep trying, rank.
